# SF1: Bantjies Debt Documentation (R18.685M)

**Annexure Reference:** SF1  
**Subject:** Bantjies's R18.685M Debt to Faucitt Family Trust  
**Relevance:** Demonstrates conflict of interest and motive to prevent fraud discovery

## Executive Summary

This annexure documents the substantial debt of R18,685,000 owed by Bantjies to the Faucitt Family Trust. This debt creates a critical conflict of interest given Bantjies's multiple roles as:

SF3_Strategic_Logistics_Stock_Adjustment.content_preview:
# SF3: Strategic Logistics R5.4M Stock Adjustment

**Annexure Reference:** SF3  
**Subject:** R5.4 Million Stock "Disappeared" from Strategic Logistics  
**Relevance:** Evidence of systematic fraud and connection to Adderory stock supply

## Executive Summary

This annexure documents the disappearance of R5,400,000 worth of stock from Strategic Logistics (SLG), attributed to a "stock adjustment" indicating the stock had "just disappeared." This represents 46% of annual sales and is 10 times the

SF4_SARS_Audit_Email.content_preview:
# SF4: SARS Audit Email (Rynette Claiming Bantjies Instructed Payments)

**Annexure Reference:** SF4  
**Subject:** Email Evidence Showing Rynette Claimed Bantjies Instructed Substantial Payments  
**Relevance:** Reveals actual chain of command (Bantjies → Rynette, not Peter → Rynette)

## Executive Summary

This annexure contains email correspondence related to a SARS (South African Revenue Service) audit in which Rynette Farrar claimed that Bantjies instructed her to make substantial payments.

critical_findings.title: JF01 - Forensic Time Capsule
critical_findings.significance: Irrefutable third-party evidence from Shopify proving Kayla's role and Daniel's involvement
legal_implications: Contemporaneous documentary evidence from neutral third party

critical_findings.title: SF2 - Sage Control by Rynette Farrar
critical_findings.significance: Direct evidence of Rynette's control over accounting system and Peter's email access

critical_findings.title: SF6 - Kayla Pretorius Death Trigger Event
critical_findings.significance: Death of Kayla Pretorius triggers business appropriation and evidence destruction

critical_findings.title: JF08 - Immediate Evidence Preservation Response
critical_findings.significance: Evidence package created day after Kayla's death, showing systematic preservation

critical_findings.title: SF2B - Prolonged Sage Access Denial
critical_findings.significance: Over 1 month denial of access to accounting system (23 July - 25 August)
legal_implications: Obstruction of access to financial records

new_leads.title: Timeline Gap Analysis: 2017-2025
new_leads.description: Analyze the 8-year gap between Shopify onboarding (2017) and death trigger (2025)
new_leads.evidence_needed: Financial records, business operations documentation for 2017-2025
new_leads.potential_impact: Establishes pattern of legitimate business operations before appropriation

new_leads.title: Rynette Email Access Pattern Analysis
new_leads.description: Analyze all instances where Rynette had access to Peter's email (Pete@regima.com)
new_leads.evidence_needed: Email logs, system access logs, correspondence analysis
new_leads.potential_impact: Proves systematic impersonation and fraud pattern

new_leads.title: Sage Subscription Ownership Chain
new_leads.description: Trace Sage subscription ownership and payment history
new_leads.evidence_needed: Sage invoices, payment records, subscription change logs
new_leads.potential_impact: Establishes control mechanism and obstruction timeline

new_leads.title: Cross-Reference SF Series with JF Series
new_leads.description: Map all SF evidence to corresponding JF evidence packages
new_leads.evidence_needed: Complete SF and JF file inventory with date correlation
new_leads.potential_impact: Strengthens evidence chain and demonstrates comprehensive documentation

new_leads.title: Court Filing Timeline vs Evidence Timeline
new_leads.description: Correlate court filing dates with evidence discovery dates
new_leads.evidence_needed: JF06 court documents, JF08 evidence packages
new_leads.potential_impact: Shows escalation pattern and respondents' responsive actions
